summary: Diff adds new Home page sections (profit examples, customer stats/testimonials, ambassador imagery), expands the color/animation system, and updates carousel/reveal behaviors with reduced-motion handling. However, it appears to violate the “English-only for new UI copy” acceptance criterion and does not provide evidence of the specifically required AI-generated ambassador image assets being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: No user-facing text is changed to non-English as part of this redesign (English only for new UI copy).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff introduces substantial non-English (Hindi) user-facing copy in the centralized content and in a new Home section heading.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required AI-generated, non-identifiable ambassador images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (including the specified filenames) and render them on the Home page.
missing_requirements.reason: Home page components reference assets under assets/generated, but the diff summary shows no added files under frontend/public/assets/generated and does not show the required specific image filenames (celebrity-ambassador-1.dim_1200x1200.png, celebrity-ambassador-2.dim_1200x1200.png, celebrity-banner.dim_1920x800.png) being added/used.

hallucinated_features.description: Diagnostics panel toggled by query parameter (?diagnostics=1).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest; adds new behavior unrelated to homepage redesign requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Placeholder hook file frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts described as empty because backend has no methods.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; adds/changes hook surface area outside the scoped homepage UI work.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad redesign/feature updates to non-Home pages (Services/Team/Gallery/Contact) and new gallery lightbox behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on Home page colors/layout/animations and adding specific Home sections and imagery; these extra page changes are not requested requirements.
